snippet.title: Mystic Melee - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Mystic Melee is a precision platforming brawler, with emphasis on physics in complex arenas. 

In addition to physical moves, you can use spells to toss massive boulders, summon a torrent of piercing ice spears, and shred your opponents with whirling leaves. Many spells have elemental interactions, like freezing your opponents solid with water and frost spell combos.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SerenityForge
Website: http://mysticmelee.com/
Trailer Music by Max Messenger Bouricius: https://soundcloud.com/gerlacus

Featuring robust SINGLE PLAYER and MULTIPLAYER modes:

With objective-based multiplayer modes that have you controlling artifacts or scoring on an enemy goal, Mystic Melee rewards mastering both combat and platforming. 

With the single-player campaign, you can hone your combat and physics-based platforming skills to compete to top the leaderboards.

Mystic Melee is developed by Ben Hopkins and published by Serenity Forge.
